title: Legion: The Legend of Excalibur Review
description:
Legion the Legend of Excalibur was the PS2's answer to Baldur's Gate Dark Alliance, and creating this review has convinced me it may be a malevolent entity. 
Support the channel at: https://www.patreon.com/mandaloregaming or https://www.paypal.me/mandaloregaming
